source.6802cff0: # How often do we have outliers ?
source.85f00a1f: Last two lines of 2021/12/31 seem to be non outliers.
source.012225cb: * Step3: how many outliers we have and how is the possibility of them ?
source.2d123bb1: * Step1: outlier data with over 40 temperature and/or over 80 humidity
source.1bc23ffe: I found some outliers in humidity and temperature. Over 80% in humidity or/and over 40 degrees in temperature.
source.a9790d1b: My hypothesis is that there are some high humidity in October, November and December. These months may be that we have a few high humidity days for some reason. And the numbers of data are a lot in October: 40,983, November: 38,253 and December: 38,617. So there are some outliers in large data especially humidity is so high. As next step, I calcurated % of outliers to count.
source.d80b1508: Temperature and humidity have negative correlation, -0.37.
source.0e285aa1: There are outliers in October, November and December. So it may be high humidity season when we may have outliers. So I looked into the humidity gap between months.
source.52a4378c: It seems that we may have outliers with the possibility of 0.005% to 0.007%.
source.7c04ee34: Ther are some correlation between temperature outliers and humidity outliers. On the other hand, ping_ms do not have any correlation with outliers.
